snippet: Rather than concede any missteps by Athens, Yanis Varoufakis is seeking to assess the flaws of the eurozone.

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Rather than concede any missteps by Athens, Yanis Varoufakis is seeking to assess the flaws of the eurozone.

headline.main: Greek Finance Minister Steers Debt Talk His Way
headline.print_headline: Greek Finance Minister Steers Debt Talk His Way
